title: eugeneisgood
author: eugeneisgood
content: I represent a new Bitcoin Mining equipment factory based in Bangkok. We'd love to start a relationship with existing Bitcoin miners. If you have contacts for existing bitcoin miners we would love to contact them to market the products.We are currently selling  equivalent s17 + and S19 Bitcoin mining equipment. Modified heatsinks , refurbished chips in brand new condition with warranty. We can also custom manufacture other specs according to your needs and deliver globally.Welcome to visit the factory, receive mining data and test the equipment.Let me know if you'd like to further the discussion. You can what app +971 585 220 663

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: You are new and many many many issues have happened many times with new guys and just a what app phone number.So lets start with the idea what price do you want for a modded S17+
